mapper.sql: txnhash, txnindex, txntype, txntime, height, amount, fee, assetname, fromaddress, toaddress, description, blockindex, confirmflag, eventtype
mapper.insert: insert into tbl_ont_txn_detail (txnhash, txnindex, txntype, txntime, height, amount, fee, assetname, fromaddress, toaddress, description, blockindex, confirmflag, eventtype) values (#{txnhash,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{txnindex,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{txntype,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{txntime,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{height,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{amount,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{fee,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{assetname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{fromaddress,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{toaddress,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{description,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{blockindex,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{confirmflag,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{eventtype,jdbcType=INTEGER})

insert into tbl_ont_txn_detail
txnhash,
txnindex,
txntype,
txntime,
height,
amount,
fee,
assetname,
fromaddress,
toaddress,
description,
blockindex,
confirmflag,
eventtype,

#{txnindex,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{txntype,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{txntime,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{height,jdbcType=INTEGER},

mapper.update:
update tbl_ont_txn_detail
txntype = #{txntype,jdbcType=INTEGER},
txntime = #{txntime,jdbcType=INTEGER},
height = #{height,jdbcType=INTEGER},
amount = #{amount,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
fee = #{fee,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
assetname = #{assetname,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
fromaddress = #{fromaddress,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
toaddress = #{toaddress,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
description = #{description,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
blockindex = #{blockindex,jdbcType=INTEGER},
confirmflag = #{confirmflag,jdbcType=INTEGER},
eventtype = #{eventtype,jdbcType=INTEGER},
where txnhash = #{txnhash,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and txnindex = #{txnindex,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update tbl_ont_txn_detail set txntype = #{txntype,jdbcType=INTEGER}, txntime = #{txntime,jdbcType=INTEGER}, height = #{height,jdbcType=INTEGER}, amount = #{amount,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, fee = #{fee,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, assetname = #{assetname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, fromaddress = #{fromaddress,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, toaddress = #{toaddress,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, description = #{description,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, blockindex = #{blockindex,jdbcType=INTEGER}, confirmflag = #{confirmflag,jdbcType=INTEGER}, eventtype = #{eventtype,jdbcType=INTEGER} where txnhash = #{txnhash,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and txnindex = #{txnindex,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select TxnHash, Height, TxnType, TxnTime, ConfirmFlag, BlockIndex, Fee from tbl_ont_txn_detail where eventtype not in(1, 4) group by txnhash order by height DESC limit #{param1}, #{param2}
select count(DISTINCT(txnhash)) from tbl_ont_txn_detail where eventtype not in(1, 4)
select TxnHash, Height, TxnType, TxnTime, Description, ConfirmFlag, BlockIndex, Fee from tbl_ont_txn_detail where txnhash = #{txnHash} order by txnindex limit 1
select ToAddress, FromAddress, Amount, AssetName, Description from tbl_ont_txn_detail where txnhash = #{txnHash} and eventtype in (1,3)
select TxnHash, Height, TxnTime, ConfirmFlag from tbl_ont_txn_detail where height = #{param1} group by txnhash
select TxnTime from tbl_ont_txn_detail where (fromaddress = #{param1} or toaddress = #{param1}) and assetname = 'ont' order by height DESC limit 1

select TxnTime from tbl_ont_txn_detail where fromaddress in ('AcsptRGJ3ijThLqjwJAgbnhzihTmAefMDZ','AWyEMxiLUVr5MeVJe3Fw5Xsij7iZUmfYyk') and toaddress = #{param1} and assetname = 'ont' order by height DESC limit 1
SELECT DISTINCT(toaddress) FROM tbl_ont_txn_detail where eventtype in (1,3)
SELECT FromAddress , Height, TxnTime, Amount, ToAddress, AssetName FROM tbl_ont_txn_detail where eventtype =3 order by height desc limit #{beginIndex}, #{amount}
